title: Postcard Typography help needed.
content:
Hello, I have an assignment for my fundamentals of Graphic Design class to design a postcard. I need help with the typography. Mainly the logo position. This design already went through a critique at school and the professor thought I could do better. Any comments would be appreciated. Thanks.

By the way the second .Jpeg was my original placement, the professor suggested maybe putting the logo on top. I donâ€™t like it there.
